messages.text: Hello all. Sometime back, there was a discussion on LightGraphs github about a DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) package. I had submitted a PR implementing a linear time shortest path algo for DAGs. After some talk with <@U6SSHL5NX> and <@U69L6CPJN> , it seemed a DAG package might be useful in JuliaGraphs. Relevant issue: <https://github.com/JuliaGraphs/LightGraphs.jl/issues/1485> PR: <https://github.com/JuliaGraphs/LightGraphs.jl/pull/1486>

text.text:
Hello all.
Sometime back, there was a discussion on LightGraphs github about a DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) package.
I had submitted a PR implementing a linear time shortest path algo for DAGs. After some talk with <@U6SSHL5NX> and <@U69L6CPJN> , it seemed a DAG package might be useful in JuliaGraphs.
Relevant issue: <https://github.com/JuliaGraphs/LightGraphs.jl/issues/1485>
PR: <https://github.com/JuliaGraphs/LightGraphs.jl/pull/1486>

messages.text: I wanted to ask whether someone from the org might be willing to mentor a GSoC project based on this? I'm interested in working on this as a student.

text.text:
I wanted to ask whether someone from the org might be willing to mentor a GSoC project based on this?
I'm interested in working on this as a student.
